root.name: Dark Age of Camelot: Shrouded Isles
root.description: Three new continents and races, with six new character classes. Also includes visual upgrades such as reflective water surfaces and real-time shadowing."From the mythical darkness, three new lands emerge in the Realms of Camelot--the Shrouded Isles. Filled with mystery and danger, but also promises of great reward, the vast, yet unexplored regions of Avalon, HyBrasil, and Aegir unfold in stunning beauty, richness and depth as your quest in Dark Age of Camelot continues."
